ai-kv13.6:1.1_0: his fetter is still present, he gives up the fetters.
ai-kv13.6:1.3_0: Their greed gives up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv13.6:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.6:1.5_0: They give up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv13.6:1.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.6:2.1_0: The path associated with greed is the mind associated with the mind.
ai-kv13.6:2.4_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv13.6:2.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.6:2.6_0: Greed is the path, skilled in goodness,
ai-kv13.6:2.8_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv13.6:2.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.6:3.5_0: “Mendicants, these four things are very far apart.
ai-kv13.6:3.8_0: This is the first thing that is easy to teach for someone who is easy to teach and the Dhamma. That’s why it is for one who is assured.”
ai-kv13.6:4.1_0: his fetter is still present, he gives up the fetters.
ai-kv13.6:4.4_0: “When their mind is immersed like this,
ai-kv13.6:4.5_0: knowledge of the ending of defilements.”
ai-kv13.6:5.5_0: “Someone who knows and sees such a thing as sensual pleasures is freed from defilements by not grasping. ...
ai-kv13.6:5.6_0: my mind was free from the pollutant of ignorance.”
ai-kv13.6:5.9_0: So then, having given up the fetters, he goes on it.
ai-kv13.6:5.10_0: The account of the presence of the noble ones is finished.
